welcome_subtitle: A Bilingual Environmental Antibiotic Risk Assessment Platform
welcome_steps: 2) Click “Run Analysis” to compute RQ / PI / RRQ.
3) Results are saved in the outputs/ folder (figures + Excel).
welcome_data_req: Required columns: Site_ID, Season, Antibiotic, Concentration_ngL, PNEC_ngL
